title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, March 11, 2022
description: On this day in 1959 Lorraine Hansberry’s play “A Raisin in the Sun” opened on Broadway. New York Times called it “the play that changed American theater forever.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1959 Lorraine Hansberry’s play “A Raisin in the Sun” opened on Broadway. New York Times called it “the play that changed American theater forever.”
